headline: Extra Space Storage (EXR): Assessing Valuation After Recent 14% Share Price Drop
summary: Extra Space Storage (EXR) shares have drifted lower over the past month, slipping 14%. Investors seem to be weighing recent trends in the self-storage market along with slight gains in annual revenue and net income for the company. See our latest analysis for Extra Space Storage. Extra Space Storage’s recent 14% drop is part of a broader losing streak. The share price is down nearly 13% year-to-date, and the total shareholder return over the past twelve months stands at -19%.
